review:
Nice try, but the product isn't final yet. Application is very prone to changes related to system/driver etc. massive crashes or starting issues even on clean systems.

Patches on principle fixing one issue but creating at least two new ones, so the game is mostly not playable.

The game itself appears uninspired, lots of potential remains unused. Physics are ridiculous and outdated.

Finally UPlay completes the disaster of this project.
Never pay again for a product that uses UPlay!

review:
9/10

+ incredible presentation, some breathtaking sceneries, sometimes almost photorealistic especially at places near water, great character models (playing the game with latest worse mod on ultra settings)
+ sci-fi setting in a realistic environment (city of Chicago), interesting story although cliche, tons of side missions and mini games, cool main character
+ gameplay wise, imagine assassin's creed in a huge city, with hacking as the main gameplay element - you use hacking to do almost everything, from hacking cameras to detect targets or set traps to hacking while driving to open door, raise bridges or even control the l-train in your advantage and much more - most of the time you will use stealth, since it will be suicide to play the game as an fps
+ seems like a very long game, took me an hour to play one of the mini-games alone, i am at the very beginning of the main story, still i have spent 10 hours allready

- the well known technical problems, shuttering especially while driving (happens to me as well sometimes, not often though) no matter how high end your pc is - these problems seem to be random, still they are not officially addressed
- hacking could use more variety, becomes tiresome soon, since it seems there are some basic things you can do and that's all
- steam overlay doesn't work !!!
- the city of Chicago seems not to be realistically presented, other than the city's known hotspots, i know i am asking a lot, but since it's one of the favorite cities i have travelled to and walked a lot, i can see lots of things missing or being diferent

if this is the first game in a series, then imo it's a successful one, much better than what the first assassin's creed was for the series, people mainly complained about the technical problems and the fact that the graphics were not as expected from the trailers, still with the worse mod they are incredibe, one of the best looking games of this generation.
highly recommended even at full price! remember games are to have fun and this one provides loooots of it.

review:
Все хоть и счетают эту игру плохой, она мне очень понравилась.
Да, она не похожа на игру, которую на показывали на E3 2013 года; всё же очень приятно играть.
Не надо сравнивать её с GTA 5, это обсалютно разные игры!!! :csgox:
С графикой всё впорядке, сама игра иногда извергает баги в большом количестве, например постоянно появляеться перед экраном кусок асфальта, <ЧТО ЗА ХУЙНЯ?? (к разработчикам)>.
Советую купить, приятной ИГРЫ))

review: Хорошая игра. Отличный сюжет, хотя в некоторых местах туповат. Великолепная графика. Как и многие игры от Ubisoft построена по принципу: "Сначала открой все вышки, прокачай все скиллы, и только тогда ты станешь скилловым хакером". Про физику машин промолчу, так как она деревянная. Если стрелять в воду, то брызгов вы не увидите, потому что воды для пуль не существует, как бы это глупо не звучало. Мультиплеер такой же деревянный. Прохождение на один раз. Рекомендую!

review:
Très sincérement, ce jeu aurait pu être mieux... Hélas, il fut pour moi une déception, et l'un des jeux auquels je regrette d'avoir acheté. Je ne sais pas par où commencer, tellement il y a à dire à propos de ce jeu. Je vais donc découper en catégories, pour juste présenter le nécessaire de mes arguments sur les raisons de ne pas acheter ce jeu, sauf si vous le voulez vraiment. 

Graphiquement, c'est pas mal, mais on ne va pas se le cacher, ça aurait pu être mieux. Est-ce à cause du développement des consoles last-gen, comme on les appelle, qui a régressé les graphismes ? Peut-être... En tous cas, une chose est sûr, Sleeping Dogs fait beaucoup mieux, même en niveau moyen. En gros, si vous désirez jouer ce jeu pour ses graphismes, vous pouvez passer votre chemin (et encore, qui joue vraiment à un jeu pour ses graphismes en premier lieu...)

Niveau scénario, le jeu propose une ambiance intéressante, et présente des idées qui explorent les problèmes de notre société actuel au niveau de la vie privée et des informations en ligne, mais ça s'arrête là. Parce que l'histoire même de Aiden Pearce est tout simplement bancale... Il n'y a rien d'intéressant à suivre, son personnage ne possède aucun charisme véritable, et pour courroner le tout, l'histoire est très courte, plus courte qu'on pourrait le croire... Donc, si c'est l'histoire du jeu qui vous intrigue, vous pouvez également passer votre chemin.

Il vient ensuite le gameplay, l'élément le plus important d'un jeu vidéo à la base. Pour ce point, je vais faire simple: ce n'est pas au niveau de GTA, ni même de Sleeping Dogs. Bien que la composante du hack apporte un peu d'originalité au jeu, cela ne propose pas grand chose au final. La conduite est horrible, surtout de la part du studio des Drivers, qui font des jeux de course... et ça imite GTA sans l'égaler, ce qui fait de ce jeu un TPS classique, bien que le côté open-world et infiltration sont bien mis en vigueur, ce qui est positif.

Bref, n'achetez pas ce jeu, même en rabais, il ne vaut pas la peine. Rien du tout ne lui vaut la peine, et ce, malgré le fait que j'ai pris 35 heures sur ce jeu, même à contrecoeur vers les dernières heures. Je crois qu'il faudra attendre la suite avant de voir le plein potentiel de cette nouvelle franchise, car ici, il n'y a rien à voir.

review:
If this game was sold with little advertising, few promises, and actually polished in its delay, it would have easily been a good game.

Yes, it did bring some novel concepts with it... Well, one concept. Hacking was extremely easy and fun "to watch," but not to play. Unless you play at the highest possible difficult, it requires a lack of thought in use. Sidequests and collectibles were fun too, really.

Besides that, everything about this game, failed to live up to its hype. Let me list the ways.

1) Graphics were gimped for PC, only for the amazing-looking E3 settings to be find hidden in the coding.
2) Hacking was not fun, or innovative. It felt like constant quick-time events that seemed coincidental at times.
3) The attempt to downplay shooting for hacking was too over-the-top. Playing with a mouse and keyboard, aiming was clunky and poorly optimized.
4) The story was boring and uncreative. Our protagonist has less personality than a mute JRPG character and narrates every bit of the story, the entire initial conflict plays out as a generic revenge story, etc.
5) Driving is awful. Honestly, Saint's Row had better driving mechanics than this. Ubisoft's attempts to make the driving authentic, made for boring chases (if not for the quick-time event hacks.)
6) Glitches, crashes, etc. Seriously, Ubisoft was given months to fix these things. They still happen.

6/10. Don't buy unless you have cash to burn and ok with about a day of looking at pretty virtual lights.

3) The attempt to downplay shooting for hacking was too over-the-top. Playing with a mouse and keyboard, aiming was clunky and poorly optimized.
4) The story was boring and uncreative. Our protagonist has less personality than a mute JRPG character and narrates every bit of the story, the entire initial conflict plays out as a generic revenge story, etc.
5) Driving is awful. Honestly, Saint's Row had better driving mechanics than this. Ubisoft's attempts to make the driving authentic, made for boring chases (if not for the quick-time event hacks.)
6) Glitches, crashes, etc. Seriously, Ubisoft was given months to fix these things. They still happen.

6/10. Don't buy unless you have cash to burn and ok with about a day of looking at pretty virtual lights.

review:
This game is great! 

I mean sure, it may lack quality in contrast to it's E3 demo but in all honesty I used a laptop to play this game and it ran perfectly fine for me. No glitches, great story and fun game play. 

I think part of the reason I enjoyed this game so much is it was my second ever game (after GTAV) that I got to experience a truly open world play style. 

It's fun to drive around a city without restrictions, comical even that I can get into a shootout, cause an EMP to go off, generate a block wide blackout then sit down with a random NPC in a coffee shop and play chess instead of being restricted to doing all these things only once or twice in a mission. 

If you're on the fence about this game here is my word of advice. 
Just buy it and don't take it far to seriously, it tackles heavy topics and yet, is incredibly hilarious if you're willing to play the Aiden (The Protagonist) like John wick. 

The more aggressive you play with his style of take downs and skills the goofier and quicker paced this game becomes :)

review:
Ещё одна качественная игра от компании Ubisoft. Эта игра может затянуть на долгое время благодаря своим плюсам (вот основные): 
1) Очень хорошая, а самое гланое захватывающая сюжетная линия. Видно что компания Ubisoft много времени уделила сюжету, его переплетению и праву выбора, что в духе разработчиков.
2) Очень сильно порадовал мультиплейер, тем что в игре не стандартное прохождения с друзьями, а что там есть миссии за которые либо получаешь очки репутации, либо их у вас отнимают. Если же вы накопили достаточно очков репутации, вам дают определенный бонус для более легкого прохождения миссий в мультиплейере.
3) Также порадовало то, что в самой игре есть мини-игры, каторые разнообразят прохождение (особено мне понравился цифрокайф).
4) Открытый мир (хоть он и ограничевается Чикаго).
Но как есть плюсы, есть и минусы как у всякой другой игры (может минусов не много, но они все же есть):
1) Огорчило то, что игра идет только на средние и сильные по мощьности компьютеры.
2) Немного подвила графика, за пол года ожиданий разработчики могли постораться и еще улучшить.
Вот мое мнение об игре Watch_Dogs, всякий кто желает, может поиграть в неё хотя бы ради сюжетной линии.

review:
Frames issues and long loading time, but still remains a good game.
I think that it is one of the longest games from Ubisoft (don't trust Steam hour count cause it comprends all the time Uplay was running).
I played almost 70 hours and did not even reach 100% (actually 98.1).
One of the things I would criticize is the drinking game because it's just made too bad for PC, with keyboard and mouse instead of controller and this doesn't allow me to reach 100%.

review: Никакого нэкстгена! Сюжет до ужаса банален и разочаровывает с самого начала игры. Процесс играбельности настолько ужастно разработан, что я даже не берусь это уг сравнивать с GTA, хотя именно её с примесью Assassin's Creed она и напоминает. Выкидывает постоянно через каждые минут 5-20, но тут это думаю не у меня одного с этим проблемы. Не вижу смысла вообще продолжать играть ибо из 10 баллов дал бы ей не больше 3. Жалею о зря потраченных деньгах. Реклама и шумиха вокруг неё не оправдывают само качество игрушки.

review:
Biggest waste of time and money ever. It has terrible performance. Terrible graphics (floating buildings and incorrect reflections ftw). Terrible TERRIBLE Physics. Like really bad. Street lights are made of paper. Crap storyline. Crap characters. Terrible Radio in cars. Terrible cars. It under delivers in ever aspect. No where near what was promised.

Pros:
-Looks decent at night in the rain.
-The wilderness like area in the top left of the map is quite nice and detailed.

Cons:
-Poor performance and optimization
-Graphics are poor
-Physics is non-existant and cartoony
-Game doesn't know if its a serious game or a crazy cartoony game
-The main character is as interesting as a half eaten lemon
-Storyline is poorly made and uninteresting
-Why are we meant to care about the dudes cousins-sisters-brothers-mothers-child-in-laws-daughter? We see her for about 2 frames in a cinematic and she is the whole reason any of this story is happening. WTF
-The Hacking is boring and repetitive. I thought this game was about hacking. Thought they'd put more effort into it.
-The best missions are the ones where another character is doing all the work because it means you actually get to "hack"
-ITS JUST SO BAD!
-DO NOT BUY

review:
So - let's address the elephant in the room. Watch_Dogs is definitely not what was promised to us. It looks worse, is poorly optimized and the story, save for some decent voice-acting, definitely leaves a lot of room for improvement.

But for me, playing as a vigilante in an open world is so much more fun than playing as a gangster in say, GTA V or Mafia II. Watch_Dogs gives you a sandbox with a lot of things to do, that will keep you engaged in the world of near-future Chicago. 
The driving isn't as terrible as you'd expect with the explosion of hate the Ubisoft interwebs have received, but it isn't amazing either. Arcadey and fun, but not as tight as you'd expect from a game with this much development time.

Aiden's character is also not as 1 dimensional as people say. His voice-actor does a good job of portraying a deeply troubled man, both addicted to and abhorred by the ctOS that makes up much of the gameplay/social commentary of the game. While a bit ham-fisted, it definitely explores some dark and very relevant themes of the age of networking. 

Give it a go, fun will be had. That is all

It's just a game

review: Буду максимально честным! игра очень неоптимизированная и это главная проблема , про убогий сюжет и скудный геймплей расскажу позже.Собственно комп спокойно тянет Вульфенштейн новый,Скайрим,Макса пейна 3 на вышаках без тромозов , а этот кусок непонятно чего , лагает и торомозит при прогрузе города.Сюжет предсказуем да и завязка неочем,кто второй хакер я сразу догадался впервые увидев нечеткое изображение.Геймплей тут предельно простой у нас миссия состоит из двух частей -первая пройтись/хакнуть/постелсерить и вторая скрыться от полиции/бандитов ВСЕ!. вообщем если не быть продажным засранцем то игра не заслуживает больше 6ти баллов из 10 , уж слишком она простая и недоработанная.

review: Comprei pelo hipe, não vale a pena, preço alto, estória sem sentido e falta de realidade(principalmente ao dirigir, cair de moto é uma missão quase imposível, você pode bater de frente com um caminhão que não cai). gráficos bons mas nada impressionante, além de exigir um pc muito potente para rodar bem (tenho um pc de ultima geração, com uma r9 280x, e so chegava a 30 fps no ultra e quando andava de carro o fps caia MUITO). a ideia do jogo e boa, tomara que no próximo da franquia esses problemas sejam corrigidos

review:
I like this game a lot to be honest.
It is not as slick as GTA 5, it is not a driving game either.

Also the combat situations are not to the quality ofCall of duty or Battlefield.

I have read some negative reviews about this game before I decided to try it for myself.

It cater sfor a market who areinterested in the specifics of this storyline ie fictional computer hacking and strategy, with plenty of openworld gaming to keep you entertained.

I also like the neat little online features where other gamers can invade your game.

It's a good game, with plenty of potential for a series of Improved follow ups.

It is not the best game ever, but games are like books.... what makes a good book ?

There is at least one notable glitch that should be fixed though. The junk Yard with T-Bone where he 'switches off' once all the bad guys are killed.

review:
This game had so much potential; but to me it is overall a frustrating experience.  I am a big fan of the concept, it is interesting and you don't see a lot of games of this type.  However, the execution is just not good.  I have had the game since release and while it has gotten better it is still not without issue.
The biggest problem, for me, was that the driving was waaaaaaay buggy.  Huge skips in frames and we are talking on pretty decent hardware (16gig ram, fx8320 OC'd, gtx770...).  Made driving without killing tons of civilians and crashing into stuff almost impossible.  This has improved with updates but still could be better.
The way that the player interacts with the world around them is kind of infuriating at times.  Whether your indicator jumps to a nearby object you weren't looking to interact with, or mission-essential cameras suddenly go 'out of range' for no reason and you have to restart; this kind of s### is super-frustrating to me.
I am not a fan of the system for monitoring your popularity with the public.  Accidental civilian injuries and deaths caused by buggy driving really hurt your rep.  Also, if you just want to screw around and kill some bad guys or randoms you can't do that if you want to maintain a high rep.  A part of the game so whatever, but it's a part I'm not a fan of.
Lastly, there really isn't much for you to do once you have fulfilled missions.  As I understand it, once you have compelted all the gang hideouts...that's it, no more gang hideouts.  I bring up the hideouts specifically because I enjoy raiding them and killing the bad guys.  If these could randomly generate throughout the game that would be awesome and provide more play-time for me.
I do not recommend this game unless you get it on sale or free from nvidia.

review:
Watch Dogs veio com uma promessa de um dos games mais revolucionário de todos os tempos, desenvolvido durante 5 anos, foi uma das maiores promessas da Ubisoft... Bem o que falar desse jogo, muita gente ja deve ter a sua opinião na ponta da língua.. então vou expressar aqui a minha depois de te-lo zerado. O game em si foi muito bem trabalhado em questão de interação, modos de jogo, cada cidadão da cidade tem a sua identidade especificada através do perfilador, vc pode encontrar coisas bizarras e muito loucas perfilando os cidadães de Chicago, o que foi muito bem trabalhado pela Ubisoft. Outra coisa que vale ressaltar também e a quantidade de câmeras no jogo, foram mais de 20 mil espalhadas em toda a cidade. Outra coisa que me chamou atenção foi os modos online que vai interação junto com a campanha, mesmo não querendo jogar online, eu posso ser Hackeado a qualquer momento por um player.. e ser forçado a encontrar o carinha, o que dá uma diversão a mais... Além disso há os convites durante o game para partidas onlines contratos e tal. E pode crer amigos isso foi muito bem trabalhado pela Ubisoft, Watch Dogs possui uma interação nota 10 . Último e principal ponto que eu deixo aqui é o da História, que é bem bacana cheio de surpresas e mistérios, e eu como um fanático em games com uma história descente curtir e me surpreendi bastante com a trama do enredo de Watch Dogs, um final misterioso e duvidoso, a Ubisoft não e boba e deixou um gostinho de Watch Dogs 2 já no final do game.. O que deixa qualquer um ansioso para uma possível continuação do game. 

Vamos lá, os pontos negativos o que muita gente já sabe na ponta da língua, Watch Dogs recebeu um Downgrade absurdo, e não foi aquilo que foi mostrado na E3 de 2013 como todos já sabem.. contato foram desenvolvidos mods que deixam o jogo igualzinho ao demonstrado. Esse talvez seja o pior ponto e mais decisivo para muitos Gamers não terem jogado Watch Dogs ou não se interessarem em jogar foi a má optimização no uso de VRAM do Game, causado por FALHAS GRAVÍSSIMAS que até hoje não se foi dado nenhuma explicação lógica da própria Ubisoft ter falhado nisso. Talvez o motor gráfico do game tenha falhado e tenha faltado vários ajustes, bugs toscos e absurdos no jogo frustaram muita gente, frustando o ''tesão'' de jogar Watch Dogs de muitos Players no mundo inteiro, principalmente de usuários AMD. Bem além de toda essa bagunça Watch Dogs ainda entrou na onda da Guerra AMD x Nvidia, por ter sido desenvolvido e patrocinado pelo Nvidia GameWorks, Watch Dogs teve uma péssima apresentação em placas de Vídeo AMD, o que já era ruim e mal optimizado na Nvidia, era mais lixo ainda em AMD Graphics card, ou seja isso tudo manchou a reputação do jogo e causou uma frustração no mundo gamer. Eu li uma máteria esses dias que Watch Dogs estava tendo dificuldade no PC pelo fato das suas memórias não serem unificadas igual nos consoles Next Gen, mais isso não é desculpa, pois a Ubisoft passou 5 anos e tinha plena consciência do que estava fazendo um jogo pra PC, ou seja o que dá a entender que eles deram preferência a criar um jogo melhor para rodar em console.. pelo menos até agora, temos uma experiencia melhor de Watch Dogs no PS4 e XBOX ONE. 

No fim o que prevaleceu foi o lado ruim do Watch Dogs, como vocês sabem noticia ruim chega rápido ao ouvido de todo mundo, e esses pontos negativos ocultaram todas as qualidades de Watch Dogs e de todo trabalho de 5 anos da Ubisoft, mesmo sendo o maior game e mais vendido na história da Ubisoft, ficou marcado pelo fracasso e falta de programação e falta de respeito com vários jogadores no mundo, que esperavam um game revolucionário. Isso tudo jogou um trabalho e interação do game Watch Dogs no fundo do poço, pois o excesso de bugs no jogo ocultam o belo trabalho feito, talvez a única coisa que foi bem trabalhada nesse jogo, a interação com o game. 


Recomendo o Game pela história e pelo bom trabalho e único bem feito pela ubisoft da interação do jogo, os modos online é diversão garantida que foi muito bem feita e planejada, mais os bugs podem atrapalhar a sua experiencia deixando um sinal de lag de vez em quando. (Vou logo avisando) =)

review:
У меня и у очень многих сильные тормоза (stuttering) в игре на высоких и ультра-настройках (хотя графическая карта должна позволять это). Тормоза эти у людей как на мощных GeForce, так и на Radeon. Даже на самых мощных типа GeForce GTX Titan. Если хотите поиграть в игру в высокой графике, лучше подождите, когда юбики выпустят исправляющий это патч (они уже выпустили несколько патчей, да эти патчи лишь другое исправляют). Тогда, может, изменю рекомендацию с "Нет" на "Да", если сама игра понравится.

Ну или если есть приставка, то есть консольные версии, в них почему-то тормозов нет.

review:
"Watch_Dogs" – игра неоднозначная, а потому и отзыв вышел таким затянувшимся. Нельзя просто пройти сюжетную линию и вынести свой вердикт,  он может получиться слишком субъективным. 
«Псов» необходимо старательно и детально изучать, каждый день по чуть-чуть открывать что-то новое, как в Чикаго, так и в себе. Действительно, в игре есть множество вещей, способных  затронуть струнки вашей души.  
Не могу сказать, что рада своему предзаказу игры, всё таки вышла она довольно сырой, со своими багами и недостатками. Поэтому человек, купивший её на распродаже или иным образом – поступил умнее.

Что касается геймплея, тут всё чисто и прозрачно. Бегайте по городу, взламывайте его жителей, вторгайтесь в их частную жизнь, угоняйте роскошные и не очень кары, ловите бандитов и маньяков, навещайте наркопритоны, плавайте в реке Чикаго сколько душе угодно, ибо Эйден Пирс никогда не устаёт, снова взламывайте жителей, подслушивайте телефонные разговоры, угоняйте роскошные кары и т.д и т.п много-много раз. Всё это богатое разнообразие жизнедеятельности главного героя и есть главный недостаток игры. Через час уже чертовски скучно слушать одни и те же разговоры, видеть одни и те же лица кругом (а как вы помните. Разработчик обещал, что мы не встретим в игре двух одинаковых персонажей, - враньё), взламывать квартиры по похожему принципу, искать тайники и тд. И вот тут-то, когда уже созревает дикое желание бросить игру, приходят на помощь некие спортивные интересы. Например, мини-игры или прохождение какого-нибудь бандитского лагеря в стелс-режиме, аля смогу-не смогу. Но. Энтузиазма этого, увы,  тоже хватает не надолго. 

В итоге что мы имеем. Сюжет коротенький и невразумительный (много деталей, мало смысла, нечёткие герои), доп.задания надоедают, сетевая игра не доработана (до выхода патчей).  Таким образом, я не удивляюсь наличию большого количества негативных отзывов, люди просто поторопились, проглотив игру целиком и сразу.  
«Watch_Dogs» как хорошее итальянское вино, которому обязательно нужна выдержка, а пить его рекомендуется маленькими глотками, таким образом, смакуя и продлевая удовольствие.  В Чикаго хочется возвращаться вновь и вновь, отбросив все задания и повествования, просто так, для наблюдения за прекрасным небом,  игрой солнечных лучей в листве или дождём, смывающим все пороки города. Тут же хочу отметить, что природу в «псах» сделали отменно, красота которой ненароком зачаруется каждый. Очень продуманная физика, трава  и деревья шевелятся, одежда и иные поверхности намокают от дождя и блестят, солнце слепит глаза, даже через монитор)) )) Оговорюсь, тут уж у кого как железо позволяет)
Можно много говорить об этом, проще всё увидеть самому. 

Подведя итог скажу, что игра вышла слабовата, но она вытащила сама себя за уши, за счёт как раз графики и общей своей привлекательности.  И даже после прохождения можно возвращаться ради ачивок или сетевых баталий с друзьями, не смотря на распространившихся в последнее время людей, использующих читы (да-да). Наслаждайтесь игрой или забудьте её как страшный сон))))

8\10

Через час уже чертовски скучно слушать одни и те же разговоры, видеть одни и те же лица кругом (а как вы помните. Разработчик обещал, что мы не встретим в игре двух одинаковых персонажей, - враньё), взламывать квартиры по похожему принципу, искать тайники и тд. И вот тут-то, когда уже созревает дикое желание бросить игру, приходят на помощь некие спортивные интересы. Например, мини-игры или прохождение какого-нибудь бандитского лагеря в стелс-режиме, аля смогу-не смогу. Но. Энтузиазма этого, увы,  тоже хватает не надолго. 

В итоге что мы имеем. Сюжет коротенький и невразумительный (много деталей, мало смысла, нечёткие герои), доп.задания надоедают, сетевая игра не доработана (до выхода патчей).  Таким образом, я не удивляюсь наличию большого количества негативных отзывов, люди просто поторопились, проглотив игру целиком и сразу.  
«Watch_Dogs» как хорошее итальянское вино, которому обязательно нужна выдержка, а пить его рекомендуется маленькими глотками, таким образом, смакуя и продлевая удовольствие.  В Чикаго хочется возвращаться вновь и вновь, отбросив все задания и повествования, просто так, для наблюдения за прекрасным небом,  игрой солнечных лучей в листве или дождём, смывающим все пороки города. Тут же хочу отметить, что природу в «псах» сделали отменно, красота которой ненароком зачаруется каждый. Очень продуманная физика, трава  и деревья шевелятся, одежда и иные поверхности намокают от дождя и блестят, солнце слепит глаза, даже через монитор)) )) Оговорюсь, тут уж у кого как железо позволяет)
Можно много говорить об этом, проще всё увидеть самому. 

Подведя итог скажу, что игра вышла слабовата, но она вытащила сама себя за уши, за счёт как раз графики и общей своей привлекательности.  И даже после прохождения можно возвращаться ради ачивок или сетевых баталий с друзьями, не смотря на распространившихся в последнее время людей, использующих читы (да-да). Наслаждайтесь игрой или забудьте её как страшный сон))))

8\10

review:
個人認為遊戲本身的設計理念非常好!
但Uplay對於亞洲玩家的服務態度真得非常非常的差!
亞洲國家的預購消費者以經晚其他國家整整1個月了，到了遊戲上市當天序號還出問題!!
處理了2天才搞定，真得讓人很失望!
還有遊戲一開始的優化真得很差，開車都會卡頓，體驗指數大大下降!!
上次更心才改善此問題，希望以後Uplay能給亞洲區玩家更多的尊重!謝謝。

review:
This game is great, not perfect by any means. There are many 'little' things and bugs here and there, but the game is fun genuinely.

The storyline was good, but instead of getting dynamic story with thrilling action, we got a flat story with a shaky plot.

The graphics in this game is great, no complains. It doesn't have the same graphics that Ubisoft promised us in E3 2012, that's right. Now I'm not having problems with the graphics, but I do with the lies..

The online is horrible with loads of bugs. The lag is unbearable, and what makes the game worse is the Uplay AI.

The hype in this game was really HUGE. It feels like it got released a year earlier than it should be. Many people bought it because of the hype, and they didn't expect that Ubisoft will fool them with this horrible optimization for the PC port.



7.75/10

review:
Não vou digitar um texto enorme porque ele vai ficar indêntico ao do Salvego, o que eu posso dizer é: arrependimento 

Hype poderia matar pessoas, Hype é uma doença, Hype é como um virús, depois de instalado ele vai se propagar e consumir voce por inteiro

Sério, acho que eu nao estava com Hype e sim com uma DOENÇA por esse jogo, desde a E3 2012 até cá eu vi cada video, cada tweet, cada forúm, pra ter ideia eu decorei os nomes de cada gameplay desse jogo, quando vi o preço, nem quis saber, paguei na pré-venda 150 na deluxe(que até hoje é o mesmo preço e voce ganha as mesmas coisas de quem fez a pré-venda)

Quando saiu a versão vazada, eu saí olhando cada gameplay, fuçava o youtube o dia inteiro, daí comecei a ler que o jogo era uma merda. Eu nem ligava, o Hype ainda era alto, altissimo, parece que tinha piorado, minha cabeça dizia "aguarde dia 27 e você terá uma masterpiece"

Que nada, chegou o dia do lançamento e o jogo mal-rodava no meu pc(Usava uma R9 280x na época) e eu tive um choque de realidade, caramba. Eu nao preciso nem continuar digitando mais sobre esse jogo, a verdade vocês já sabem

Mas eu tenho que dizer algo, tenham cuidado, sério, tenham muito cuidado com essas empresas de jogos, HYPE é uma DOENÇA e se você pegar ela, provavelmente vai se dar mal

E se eu recomendo este jogo? Bem, recomendo não, baixem o pirata, vamos ver se assim a Ubisoft aprende a tratar melhor os ex-fãs dela.




PS: É sério que até hoje o jogo custa 130 com as mesmas vantagens da pré-venda? haha

review: after playing this game for so long I can say that it brings much lols and pleasures. I love going into the city crashing into people with my heavily armored vehicles and running over people without much of problem from the police. You can even do it slowly in front of people and they wont call the police :D. Chicago is great. Oh, and even if you are near a police station and you're causing a mass histeria by blowing up vehicles and killing tons of people as long as the comms are down they wont respond :D

review:
Установил на новый ноутбук и все отлично идет без лагов, поиграл - не плохая игрушка но наскучила, я не знаю что со мной, тогда когда не было GTA V на ПК я считал ее некой такой заменой)) сейчас же уже даже не знаю, я очень хочу ее пройти, но времени на нее нет, пока что нет) не знаю.. полностью пройду в очень далеком будущем и напишу свой отзыв, а пока вот мой старый отзыв:



[h1]Играть невозможно - страшные лаги, да, мой ПК уже устаревает так что немогу точно оценить игру[/h1]

Даже на самых низких настройках подтормаживает во время бега, немного подтормаживает во время вращения камеры вокруг главного героя, сильно тормозит во время быстрого вращения камеры, игра вроде не плохая, но как следует оценить не могу. 

Начну с минусов:

-Эта чертова регистрация в ненужном Uplay я просто хочу запустить и играть, зачем мне Uplay если все равно не собираюсь мультиплеер использовать, но к сожалению регистрация обязательна и к счастю ничего геморойного, регистрация прошла быстро и без выноса мозга, это не же "Windows Live" который я очень сильно ненавидел >:( но все равно нелюблю когда меня заставляют регистрироватся. 

-Это лаги, иногда страшные а иногда нету, временами тормозит если путешествуешь по городу, не знаю от чего это зависит, когда как. Обычно я привык что любая игра идет без прооблем, пусть это будет первая игра в которой я встретил лаги, давно их не видел, со времен старого ПК куда давно пытался установить игры вроде Fallout 3 или Bioshock но ПК зависал. 

Плюсы (наверное их было бы больше)

+Многие жаловались на графику, но как по мне смотрится отлично хоть и запустил на минималках (на ультра и высоких вылетала) хотя для меня она не главное, мне бы город посмотреть и пройти сюжет. 

+У Эйдена Пирса просто отличная одежда, смотрится на 100/100 

+Я не фанат Ассасина и не играл не в одну из них, для меня анимация Эйдена Пирса Бег/Стелс режим это новое.

+Можно взламывать камеры, читать переписку и многое другое.. но некоторые пишут что потом все это надоедает и игра становится скучной. 

+Все полностью переведено на русский язык, даже радио. 

+Есть отсылки к MLP что делает игру на 20% круче.

Обычно я привык что любая игра идет без прооблем, пусть это будет первая игра в которой я встретил лаги, давно их не видел, со времен старого ПК куда давно пытался установить игры вроде Fallout 3 или Bioshock но ПК зависал. 

Плюсы (наверное их было бы больше)

+Многие жаловались на графику, но как по мне смотрится отлично хоть и запустил на минималках (на ультра и высоких вылетала) хотя для меня она не главное, мне бы город посмотреть и пройти сюжет. 

+У Эйдена Пирса просто отличная одежда, смотрится на 100/100 

+Я не фанат Ассасина и не играл не в одну из них, для меня анимация Эйдена Пирса Бег/Стелс режим это новое.

+Можно взламывать камеры, читать переписку и многое другое.. но некоторые пишут что потом все это надоедает и игра становится скучной. 

+Все полностью переведено на русский язык, даже радио. 

+Есть отсылки к MLP что делает игру на 20% круче.", "timestamp_created": 1409163116, "timestamp_updated": 1448565542, "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 2, "votes_funny": 0, "weighted_vote_score": "0.532029926776885986", "comment_count": 9, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review: The story line was great in my opinion, but gameplay wise it is kind of repetative, online play sucks, graphics not as good as what was shown at E3, and if I am shooting someone with a Barrett M107 Anti Material Rifle in the head I dont think I would need a second bullet even if he is wearing some sort of metal helmet + mask, if i need to then it kind of takes out the "Anti material" from the Anti Material Rifle. Driving was okay in my humble opinion but i mostly drive in the car that looks like a Ford Mustang; can't remember the name of the car.

review:
Is it as bad as  people made it out to be .. not really  it has some flaws and crash's now and then. The graphics were dumbed down some yes. How ever still a great over all game play with some minor issues 

Side note In order to play this game as it should be played ,You need a Beefy PC 

yes there are loads of video's online of people with monster rigs that struggle to play this title. 
Heck Even My PC struggles to keep it running great 
this Game IS VERY CPU Hungry, RAM HUNGRY, And Will Give your GPU a work out.
the min system requirments for ram is 6 GB .. I would not recomend playing this title with anything less than 16 GB of Ram 
it hits 6-7 GB of Ram usage on my system and for CPU load hits high 67 % total usage. And for GPU memory pretty sure it uses all 3 GB.
I have not progressed very far in this title yet but do this you should give it a try, now if your looking for a GTA 5 feel. I hate to say it but falls quite short. Even Saints row 4 would be pushing it . 

This title falls into its own Spot,With its own feel and style, the game play does get repetitive, and over all story its Meh at best, But If your looking for something to fill the Void while we all wait for the face palm of 2014, (GTA 5) which its self will most likely be a buggy mess ... Even though PC users have been waiting ages .. :) but yeah not bad game play over all 

outta 10 might give it a 6-7 outta 10 not great but .. not to bad . 
And for the record system specs are as follows 

4770k 
Gigabyte UD3H  
32 GB Ripjaws Z ram 
EVGA SC 780 Ti  (Boosts to 1100 Mhz) 
and a long list of hard drives, SSD,s and fancy fans 
All in a Cooler Master HAF-EATX  (Rate this up if you would like me to post a Quick Video of In game on my rig)

review: I do not recommend this game to anyone on the PC as far as my experience has gone playing this game many aspects are either poorly done or broken. When I first started playing the game it would only run for about 20 minutes before crashing, as frustrating as that was I figured I would wait till they patched it up. While the issues of the game crash after short periods has stopped the game its self is still very broken as far as what I can see, I suffer from large FPS drops going from 90 FPS and droping down to 10 FPS needless to say this has been very disappointing. I tried to resolve this issue by dropping the resolution from 2560 x 1440 to 1920 x 1080 with no luck. The part that bothers me about this so much is that I’m running it on a system that has 2 GTX 780Ti's that run every other game beautifully. The interactions that you have with in world items is very clunky and you have to fences with many items to get them to respond. I have watch a few friends play this on the xbox and PS with good results, sadly PC support is just not there for this game.

review:
От этой игры ждали гораздо большего, она не оправдала ожиданий, не стало некст геном, не стала чем то таким мега куртым и не обычным. Но все же это отличная игра с отличным графоном, с очент крутым геймплеем и перестрелками, с неплохим сюжетом, кривым управлением машин и забаганым мультиплеером =)

review:
Independente do harware que você usa no seu PC, este jogo irá travar, apresetar "lag" e te obrigar a rodar com configurações mais baixas do que você espera. 

A ideia do jogo é muito legal, a jogabilidade também.
A história é fraca, o arsenal de armas pouco variado e a arma mais legal do jogo a Vector com silenciador (sempre use silenciador) só é liberada vencendo diversos desavios multiplayer.
O multiplayer em sí nao é nada divertido.

review:
In all the game was enjoyable and fun but a few things were wrong with it that made the experience less enjoyable. The graphics were not anything special, it all looked like AC2 which is much older than this game. The multiplayer was not even worth trying as it was hard to stay centered and things just didnt make sense sometimes. The campaign(which i have not finished) is good and quite fun if you get into it. The weapons could have been better and more thought out. Stealth macanics were pretty good given that it is a loud game. Driving mechanics were rough but manageable given that driving games should not be played on a PC. Hacking was very fun and thats why most of us bought it, the fact that you could just be this cyber criminal was awesome and that is the best thing is the game. I will now set aside a few things that made the game great. The song feature was awesome and there were not faults in it GOOD JOB UBISOFT. The parkour system they do so well was back and i was so greatful for that GOOD JOB UBISOFT. All of the AWESOME DIGITAL TRIPS that you could do including PILOTING A MOTHA******* SPIDER TANK. Over all the game was over hyped and a bit under done but for the current price ($40) I think that it is quite reasonable. So a last message 

It was not your finest hour Ubisoft.

review:
ゲームとしては面白い　それ以外の点に問題があるらしい　
自分は何の問題もなかったけど

E3 2012年をリアルタイムで見ていたが2014年最初の延期のときにゲームコンセプトを変更したらしく市民に対してテイクダウン（気絶攻撃）ができなくなったりドライブバイ（運転中の射撃）ができなくなったそして一部のグラフィックが劣化しているという問題もあるにも関わらず推奨スペックでもかなり重い
それ以外の点は概ね面白いと言える、ストーリーもアメリカン映画を見ている気分だった
以上の点を踏まえてそれでもいいよって思う人はセールのときに買ってみたらいいでしょう
個人的にはマルチが結構面白い

review:
Tem um gráfico meio GTA IV, mas vale a pena! Também pela dublagem e a iniciativa da empresa Ubisoft de lançar um jogo de console junto com a versão de PC! Contrário de GTA V, que decepcionou todos, inclusive eu!
Quem fala mal dele não sabe aproveitar o verdadeiro suco do jogo, porque é isso que realmente importa!!

review:
In se il gioco è ben sviluppato, ma su pc non rende bene perchè è palese il porting da console e devo dire che il gioco ne risente parecchio.

Il gameplay è un po' ripetitivo ma dopo aver applicato qualche mod sono riuscito ad ottenere gli effetti e le bellezze di questo vasto titolo che erano state mostrate al mondo all' E3.

~Trane_LoneWolf~[ITA]

review:
Деньги выброшенные в жony. Это шлак. Хорошо разрекламированный шлак. Не слушайте шкальников которые с пеной у рта орут что игра классная, что она не похожа на другие, что она лучше ГТА4. Это реально помои за 1199, графика уровня 2010-2011, я молчу про физику которой нет. Красная цена этому гомну  399 рублей, на большее она никак не тянет. Мне лень даже писать все минусы, о них уже много написано. Если вам ее подарят или купите со скидкой в 85-90%, тогда она стоит того.
Не берите кароч за 1199 и за 799.

review: Très déçu, je m'attendais à beaucoup mieux, quand le jeu a été annoncè à e3 2012, je me suis dit, bordel il tue ce jeu, et en faîte je pense que quand il font une annonce dans ce genre de salon il y'a toujours une mise en scène, et je trouve sa dommage parce qu' on s'attend tous à une bombe puis au final on a une vielle merde, franchement 60 euros pour un jeu pareil ça ne vaut pas le coup, claquer votre argent autrement, même niveau graphisme je trouve ça banale, je pense que Ubisoft aurait pu faire mieux, je lui donnerais la note de 14/20 .

review: Awesome game, I had no problems with Uplay like others but it would obviously be better if it wasn't there at all! BUT, I am having a load of glitches with it, sometimes it will load up and there will be no dialogue audio but there will still be subtitles and the only audio I get is coming directly from aiden (except dialogue) then there are other times when it will accidentally use the wrong audio, for example, yesterday I started a car and instead of a revving engine, it started playing some old western music that wasn't coming from the radio because the radio started playing at the same time... Good game, but needs major fixes!

review:
The hacking grows old really fast, the missions are repetitive and usually annoying as hell.
Exploring Chicago was the best part, as I really didnt like to play the main story since I didn't like the missions. (Stealth parts were ok, but driving around trying to catch assholes  grew old FAST.)
Oh, and the missions being bad, the story itself is very boring and uninteresting.

It has the usual Ubisoft sidestuff you can do while exploring (raid enemy "camps", finding towers etc.) you are familiar from FarCry3 and Assasins Greed.

Also fuck you Ubisoft for screwing with the graphics on the PC version. If you buy this game, use the mod to unlock the E3 graphics for this game.

All in all, machined, forced new game that was way over hyped and not worth 50 bucks.
Don't waste money, buy if it comes to sale on X-mas or next summer. Save your money for the GTA 5 PC release.

review:
So, after a complete windows reinstall with full up to date drivers, the game still stutters like mad.  However, it is buttery smooth at high settings when windowed.  So, I played it like that.  The rest of the review is about the game, not the technical issues.

The game is just plain great.  I really loved the setting (Thank you for doing Chicago instead of NY or LA) and the hacking mechanics.  The graphics get a C+ (The Worse Mod ups that to a B, with the E3 getting a solid A), with the cars, people and city looking good.  What really stood out to me was one of the best stories for a game of this genre and phenominal voice acting.  At first the driving mechanics bugged me a bit, but as you venture into other areas and use different vehicles you discover that there is a lot of variation in how each one drives.  After finishing it, I just felt like going around and seeing all the extras.  I usually do side missions after I complete the main story.

Gameplay - A
Graphics - C+
Gunplay - C (they just dont feel too effective)
Driving - B
Hacking and Profiling - A
Story and Acting - A+
Techicals - F

Overall - B+/A-

review:
When I first saw that this game was announced I was hyped just like the rest of the world. I pre-ordered the deluxe version (for €69,99) so I was pretty pissed when the game finally came out and it just didn't work. It kept crashing, my max FPS was around 11 (with a high-end PC) and the graphics didn't even come close to what Ubisoft showed they would be. Personally I've learned a lesson from this experience, and that lesson is to never ever pre-order a game. This was the first game that I've ever pre-ordered and I'll never do that again. From now on I'll wait on reviews on steam before buying a game. Now, on to the positives and negatives off the game.

Negatives:
- The graphics weren't all that good
- The sidemissions (especially the extra ones form the deluxe package) weren't very compelling to do
- The story sometimes could get a little confusing (but that could also be me)

Positives:
- I liked the way the hacking worked, I was glad to see Ubisoft didn't make it too hard so you could use it fast
- The storyline was very interesting
- The voice acting was pretty good

When I was able to look passed the flaws and Ubisoft updated the game to a point where it was playable. I enjoyed Watch_Dogs very much.
If you were to ask me if this game is worth anywhere from €50 to €70, I'd definately say no. I myself regret spending so much money on it. I don't say that you shouldn't buy the game. But I'd buy it for a low price (€10 to €20 max).

review:
OH JEEZ HE WROTE A POSITIVE REVIEW ON WATCH_DOGES, GO GET EM!

Ok ok ok, I understand that some people are really upset that the game is WAAAAAY overhyped. I would be upset aswell. You get home, sit down at the computer and drop part of your latest paycheck on the game you where excited for. You soon realize that the game doesnt look as good as it did at E3. Aiden kinda seems like Batman with his grumbly voice and vigilanty style. You soon get upset because you expected to be orgasming all over your monitor every 10 seconds, but only getting a slight boner.

I was not one of these people.

I picked up Watch Dogs not to long ago (today is Sept 4th, 14) because the idea of a free roam mixed with elite haxxor skillz by shaking off cops and others by changing street lights, deploying road blocks to stop cars in there tracks, or even causing blackouts to move in for a stealthy kill. I play on a keyboard, and ive never had a problem hacking things in the game nor have I ever thought that I need to go out of my way to press Q and drive or shoot at the same time.

Yes, the vanilla textures DO NOT look how they did at E3 Whateverthefuckyear as it does in the game. Well problem fixed because there is a SUPER simple mod on how to make it look like it did. 

Yes, Uplay is a major chore to deal with. Almost everyone can agree that Uplay is just more stupid DRM that no one likes. Personally I have never had a problem logging into Uplay with any Ubi game ive bought. (Far Cry series, AC series, blah)
The thing is, Uplay isnt going away. Ubisoft thinks that Uplay is on par or better then steam, so get used to it. I did, it sucks, but it takes like another 15 seconds in the game launch.

As for the game itself, I really enjoy everything that Chicago has to offer. From the people walking the streets to the various street games to play. I spent a long time in a game of chess with an NPC, and it still ended in a tie. I didnt feel bad I just went on to the next thing to do, and I enjoyed the shit out of doing that aswell.

"Well what did you do after the chess match that you quote, enjoyed the shit out of?"

Well id love to tell you. Watch Dogs has a feature that Aidens "Super Future Super Phone" will go off and tell you if there is a, *mhm* random criminal act going on, large gang locations, criminal convoys in the area and more. Each one is a different situation, with different people, and in a different location. And I enjoyed swooping up on criminals and saying "Boo" as I beat the shit out of them.

In the end, I reccomend Watch_Doges to anyone who enjoys GTA open world exploring with a haxxor twist. A great man once said, and by that I mean my 56 year old alcohalic Uncle said one time, "Its not a waste of money if you enjoy it."
 
ANYONE WHO COMPLAINS ABOUT THE CRAP DRIVING IS JUST A SHIT DRIVER, THESE TIRES ARENT COATED WITH BUTTER AS PEOPLE SAY. GET BETTER AT VIDEO JUEGOS .3.

The game is by far beautiful and the open world leaves you occupied. I highly recommend it.

review: Perhaps I'm not a graphics snob but this game's graphics are nothing to sneeze about. Gameplay is fun and if you like driving there is plenty of it. Maybe they went a bit too heavy on the car chases but hey, its still a good game. Plently of side gameplay after and during campaign. I've got about 21 hours on here and have not yet finished campaign and thinks its a pretty good deal. Haven't tried multiplayer though I might later. Give this game a chance if you have the money but if you don't wait for sale. I'd saw you could easily get 100 hours of gameplay out of this over a long period of time.

review:
[h1] Watch dogs, ma plus grosse deception apres Battlefield4? [/h1]
Watch Dogs se presentait comme un jeu difficile, ou l'infiltration et la reflexion devait etre au coeur du jeu, le contraire de GTA et ceci aurait été génial.
Les graphismes devaient etre révolutionnaires, la conduite géniale (ce jeu devait etre un "driver" à la base)

[b] Mais il n'en n'ait rien...[/b]
-L'infiltration se resume en: Pan, Pan, Boum
-La reflexion en un "Ou puis-je mettre ce point de compétence?"
-Le jeu a ete rétrogradé graphiquement sur PC pour égaler les consoles "next-shit" (Ils nous auront fait chier jusqu'au bout ceux la!)
-La conduite tant qu'a elle est nulle, rigide,bref sans interet.... (ca aurait ,au passage, surment été le pire driver, c'est surment pour cela que ce jeu est devenu watch-dogs)
-Le multi est nul, s'incruster dans les parties des autres... quelle connerie, de un: si quelqu'un te rejoinds tu a un petit freeze qui te fait directement comprendre que tu va voir un idiot courir dans tout les sens et de deux: les trailers se foutaient bien de notre guelle, si tu pirate quelqu'un celui ci ne cherchera pas a te trouver mais se cassera au plus vite avant que tu es fini, ou alors rage quittera...

[b]Watch dogs reste marrant mais n'ait pas du tout ce qui nous a été promis, perso je m'attendais pas a un espece de GTA like bourrin... UBISOFT fait maintenant partie de ma liste noire a coté d'EA [/b]

review:
I get it that you need to have the requirements, and I respect that. When I got the game I thought my CPU could handle it, but, I need Directx 11 installed! I couldn't even launch the game, and I waited over 2 hours for it to install. Also, seeing the negative reviews I'm SHOCKED to realize how bad the graphics are, yet I need top-of-the-line high tech s###. I am glad that I got a refund from Valve, but my advice is: If you don't think you have the minimum requirements, don't spend $60.


Ubisoft, because of the reviews concerning "top of the line" (sarcasam) graphics, I don't understand why I need to buy a Mac book air/Pro to "handle" it properly.

review:
If Steam customer support was up to the standards of Origin, I would have got a refund on this over hyped, under performing piece of non sense. 

This is a glorified GTA IV mod at best, but runs worse. The game play is no where near as complex as trailers made it out to be nor does it look as good (unless you hack the game files to make this hacking game look better....)  and the story is complete and utter pants, obvious story is boring. 

Not fit for the purpose as intended nor is it as advertised.

Great game, had to turn off SLI for my graphics card due to constant SLI stutter. None of the Nvidia driver updates or ubisoft updates resolved this issue. To be fair it ran very well with just one GTX 660 Ti.

review:
Watch_Dogs, meine Meinung dazu.

Das Spiel ansich wurde ja extrem Gehypt im vorfeld. Alle hatten sehr hohe Erwartungen nicht zuletzt dank den Trailern der E3. Nun, wurde das Spiel den ansprüchen Gerecht? Jein. 

Viele waren enttäuscht von der Grafik, sie sei nicht auf E3 niveau. Das stimmt, aber sie ist dennoch hübsch anzusehen. Was mich schon eher sehr genervt hat war der Fakt das ich die ersten 2 Monate nach release nicht spielen konnte da das Spiel nach 10-20 Minuten abgestürzt ist. Oder die Fahrsteuerung, die ist ohne Controller einfach nur schrecklich und sehr hinderlich bei einigen Missionen.

Die Schwierigkeit des Spiels empfand ich als angebracht, es gab knifflige Missionen und viele einfache, also eine gute Mischung.

Die Story hatte Tiefgang auch wenn sie teils erzwungen wirkte, man konnte sich in Aiden hineinversetzen und verstand warum er so agierte.

Alles in allem kann ich zu dem Spiel raten. Es ist definitiv kein Schlechtes Open World spiel und in meinen Augen gelungen.

review:
I am not one to normally review a game but I felt like I should for this one so here we go:

With the limited time I spent with Watch Dogs it was extreamly fun, the story was interesting however you could see most plot twists coming a mile away. If you are someone who enjoys open world games like GTA then you may enjoy this game.

What killed the game for me was the CONSTANT crashing. Like, I couldn't even play more than one hour at a time without experiencing a crash and that was on good days. Most of the time I could play between 20-30 minutes before the game tells me to go screw myself and closes.

To say I am disappointed is a major understatement, I loved everything about this game and followed it for 2 years. I bought the Deluxe edition and was there at mid-night ready to play the game. After I got in-game the crashing started, it took me three tries to get past the intro cutscene, and playing after that it took me another 7 tries to finish the intro mission. Safe to say that I was beyond annoyed.

To explain, I have a really great PC. I7 Intel Processor @3.7 GHz, 12 GB RAM, HDD of 2TB. The only component that was "crappy" is my GPU aka Graphics Card: HD Radeon 7570. Now I put the game on minimum settings for graphics and still I crash, My graphics may not be above the recommended specs but it is above the minimum. Which makes me think that the minimum specs aren't actually what they say they are.

So because I have an AMD graphics card it crashes the game (Its A Graphics Card Crash)...I read storys around the internet and its a big feasco on he said, she said. I understand that UBI has something going on with NVidia and thats cool, but if your game won't work with AMD graphics even when above the minimum requirements then just don't release it for AMD machines. I would rather be upset that the game wasn't availible for me than to purchase a 70.00$ title to keep in my library that absolutly doesn't work.

I tested the game out today (September 7, 2014) to see if those 2 patches that were released for Watch Dogs does anything to fix the game but it only made it worse for me. The game doesn't even launch anymore, BEST PURCHASE EVER (Sarcasm)!

Since it is completly broken for me I wanted to write this review for anyone else who is thinking about buying this game:

If you have an Nvidia GPU then I would recommend it because it is a game that does something completely different from any other game out there.

If you have an AMD GPU then stay the hell away from this product and I don't recommend buying this game until it is fixed for AMD piecies and there is a 100% guarantee that the game will work. Trust me you don't want to have a 70.00$ purchase that doesn't launch in your library.

To everyone who read this complete review I congradulate you and thank you for your time.
Have a great day!

review:
Я играл в эту игру  последний раз в момент её выхода. Я очень сильно на неё надеялся и ждал, что всё будет как я ожидал... Ага. Не тут-то было. Я не буду повторяться за всеми, говоря про картинку игры и её игровой процесс, хотя и очень хочется. Так вот.... Спустя 4 месяца, я решаю вернуться в игру и посмотреть что там добавили интересного за такой промежуток времени и вижу... НИЧЕГО. Спустя долбаных 4 месяца, всё, что сделали разрабы, это запихали никому ненужные ДЛЦ про персонажей, которые нахрен никому не упёрлись никуда. Да о чём тут говорить - они не удосужились даже сделать так, чтобы буквы в игре были БУКВАМИ. А не символами со сбившейся кодировкой... Да, может это косяк наших локализаторов, но всё же: почему никто никого не пинает? Это ужас ведь какой-то. Я молчу про поведение авто и управление в целом. 
Я бы не посоветовал брать людям эту игру даже со скидками...

review: Although this game didnt live up to the hype, it's still a very decent game. This game will probably fulfil your fantasies as being a hacking Bad-ass. Wait till this game gets a price drop. Around $20, this is a great buy. I highly recommend downloading The Worse's Mod ( if your hardware it up to it) to enhance the graphical experience to make it come close to "E3 Watch Doge" and play the game closest to what it was supposed to become.

review:
Note: When I got this game, I hadn't really been paying attention to the amount of hype this game was getting, so I went into it with next to no expectations. I've read a couple of the other reviews and they all said the game was over-hyped and did not meet their expectations. I think that many people wrote bad reviews abou this game because it wasn't as good as they thought it was, not because it was genuinely a bad game. 

Pros:
1. Large, open map
2. Good number of side missions and activities (many of them are renewable, so you can replay them if you want to)
3. Variety of multiplayer gamemodes including 1v1 hacking/tailing, decryptions (team and free-for-all), street racing, ctOS Mobile, and free roam.
4. Graphics are good. Not great.
5. Performance issues (at least for me) are minimal, although many people have had problems.
6. Fun to screw around in the open world (singleplayer or multiplayer)
7. Penty of fun, little gadgets for you to mess around with (lures for guards, jam coms to block reinforcement/911 calls, 2 types of IEDs, blackouts that shut off the power, grenades, and ctOS scans)
8. You can manipulate and use the environment to your advantage (blowing out steam pipes to blow up pursuing cars, but up road spikes to block enemies progress, extending treadles to blow out tires, using cameras to map out an area)

Cons:
1. Can become repetitive over time
2. Online invasions can be annoying when they happen to you (other people can invade your game at any time aside from active missions and attempt to hack you)
3. Ubisoft insists on attaching UPlay to it, so you to deal with that BS.
4. Vehicle physics are a bit odd, and many people hate them (I don't personally mind them, though).
5. When driving, the camera will not look straight up, so if there is a helicopter flying above you, you can't hack it unless you somehow go faster than it, stop your car and get out and hack it (this will usually get you killed), or wait for it to reposition, which it does semi-often.
6. I've been having an odd glitch where if you die, Aiden refuses to put his hands in his pockets after you respawn, which doesn't change gameplay, it's just kind of annoying. I have to go out to the main menu and go back in to get the animation to work again. I don't know if this is a common problem or if it's just me, but it drives me insane. (If anyone has a solution to this, feel free to share it)
7. If you have a bad reputation (from killing/injuring cops or civilians) there are news reports that come on. These reports block out any music you have playing, put up a little screen to block the middle of your view and tell you and everyone arounbd you how much of a horrible person you are. Not to mention, any civilian that gets a good enough look at you will call 911. There is no way to turn these off besides being a perfect human being, and let's face it. No one here will ever do that.

review:
интересный разнообразный и про хакеров. С детства обожал фильм "Хакеры" и за молодую, ядрёную Анжелину Джоли (которая мне нравится больше, чем в "Расхитительнице гробниц") и за просто феерических фриков-хакеров с их ахрененно 3дешным хаком. А, да, и за эпизод с русскими хакерами в кожанках в пивняке тоже. Так вот, пусть кричат, что содрали его с ГТА, да даже пусть так и будет, но ГТА тупее и скучнее. Тут тебе и сюжет ходи-проходи и разнообразные побочные задания и отдых мозгом во всяких мини-игрушках на любой вкус и тот самый 3дшный хак во всей красе. Паркур реалистичный - одна штука, стэлс добротный - одна штука, перки разные - россыпью. Отдельной строкой - аккуратная вписка в твой уютненький Чикаго онлайн-оппонентов. короче говоря всего и не перечислишь, выбирай на свой вкус. Что-то я бегал и выискивал по всему городу, за что-то даже и браться не хотел. Город так же разнообразен: деловые районы, заводы, заброшки, пригород с реднэками, негритянское гетто(!) Сюжет звёзд с неба не хватает но добротен и логикой не обделен. Что ещё? управление не шибко напряжное, хотя опять же консольное. Временами путаешь кнопки и в менюшку выбора оружия во время боя сложно выползти.
Отдельно скажу дико понравилось подглядывать сцены из жизни людей, чуствуешь себя бабкой-соседкой из двери напротив :)

review: 看门狗游戏的确给我了前所未有的新体验。但是制作组对于游戏的优化。和商业问题的方面处理的非常差劲。首先是对于亚洲玩家有一个月的延迟。以及仅仅为了图省事。将亚洲和日区的游戏作为同一个。虽然，育碧你的确是一个商业化的游戏制作公司。但是，作为一个玩家。一个非常喜欢育碧制作的游戏的玩家。对于育碧的某些所作所为。非常的失望。游戏好，的确值得肯定。认同。但是游戏制作的同时。是否也应该本着以人为本的心理。兢兢业业为玩家着想呢？

review:
Absolutley the worst purchase i have ever made. complete waste of money.
[h1]Watch_Dogs™ has a lackluster story that's been tart'ed up with micheal bay styled..... everything.[/h1]

Avoid, completed the came in under 15 hours ignoring the easter egg junk on the highest difficulty. 
Forced myself to get 70 hours playtime to get my moneys worth, which included myself, my girlfriend and 3 other mates all finishing it and leaving bored and underwhelmed. 

Typical ubisoft to have a whole lot of nothing once completing the story.. 
Multiple easter egg hunts thrown in to cover up the lack of content. game could have been great but 

Difficulty? the most dificult thing is getting the ridiclous uplay DRM junk to work and spending a day in the
game files hacking everything apart to remove the microstutters, crashes and various other released far to early issues. 

you could what? pre-purchase how many months before its release?
....this game leaves a bad taste on the bankstatement and your solid state. 

I could shout and scream about all the different problems with this video game for some time,  
but that would be giving ubisoft my opinion on how to create a game that would be fantastic and devlop a cult following and a large modding community that'd keep their title alive and burning for years... [i]for free[/i].

dear ubisoft, if you would like to purchase this limited edtion ULC called my opinion, please send $60 usd to my steam wallet.
I'll also bundle it with some extra exclusive drm free dlc freaturing my technical advisory for the other $20 you owe me for the refund of this complete waste of time...

the good stuff in this game?
maybe the... no wait.. ok.. been sitting here legitimately foir 10 minutes trying so very hard to think of the good... the animations were pretty good.

review:
To start things off, I only recommend this game if you like open-world games and you have the system to run it.  If you like open world games like GTA, Saint's Row, and the like, you should enjoy this game.

I liked this game, but it plays to my sensibilities.  I like stealth, I like being clever and sneaky and I love cyberpunk.  Make no mistake, this game is a cyberpunk game wearing a modern day skin.  You are a Netrunner, a Slicer, a Decker.  You have cybernetic enhancements that let you wirelessly control the world around you.  You can slow time down with enhanced reflexes.  You're an Edgerunner (or Shadowrunner, if you prefer).  The game calls you a "Fixer", but that's just another synonym.  You fight evil corporations, corrupt politicians, and criminal organizations in a quest for revenge.  It's so Cyberpunk it almost hurts that there's no chrome or neon in sight.

Would this game have been better as a proper cyberpunk game?  Maybe, maybe not.  Updating the cyberpunk look to the modern day is hardly a terrible idea, and more people likely played it as a result.  That said, let me get to what I liked and didn't like about this game.

Pros:
-The city is large, and yet varied.  You have the financial districts, the dock area, the industrial zone, the residential suburbs, the inner city slums, and the oddly rural region of Pawnee, all of which give you a lot of variation in where you go and how it looks.  Having been to Chicago, I'm pretty sure they scaled the whole thing down, but that's always difficult to tell when you spend most of the game blasting through the streets at 80 MPH.  This though, is to be expected, but what is nice is the degree of access you have to buildings, tunnels, and the trains.  I'm still waiting on the game that gives me full access to these things, but Watch Dogs has a decent selection at least.
-The Hacking is really cool.  You can do a lot of fun and creative things with the tools at your disposal, and the other toys you get, like the communications jammer, the blackout hack, and the noisemaker are a lot of fun as well.
-Combat works too.  You can go quiet or you can go loud, it's your choice, and the result can change the game's experience for you.  I found it usually more fun to sneak around, use hacks, and outsmart the AI, but blasting through them can be pretty satisfying as well.
-The game is very pretty, especially after downloading the graphics "patch".  Before that, it was just decent looking, but after, it was marvelous.
-Invasions are tremendously fun and a great way to break up the missions.  The multiplayer in general is a good amount of fun, but it has some drawbacks.  Fortunately, it's more fun than it's not.
-The soundtrack has some great songs in it and the ability to set your own playlist, while not that intuitive, let you set up everything rather nicely.

Cons:
-Combat + Stealth is perhaps too easy.  Silenced weapons and decent stealth techniques result in trivial combat most of the time.  Once I got the silenced pistol, never mind the silenced assault rifle and submachine gun, the need to pull off clever tricks in fights was limited to just about never.
-Money is not an issue.  Early on you may scrape by for cash, but a couple of upgrades into cash hacking and some rich jerks later, and you're rolling in it.  I started leaving behind $1,000 prizes at hotspots for other players just because I couldn't spend it on anything more if I wanted to.  I stopped hacking people's bank accounts unless the profiler told me they were particularly contemptable individuals.
-Clothing is weak.  Nearly all of the outfits are just reskins of the main outfit Aiden wears with the coat and the ballcap.  Not cool.  The best clothing option is the one with the fedora that makes you look like you're out of some Noir story, which fits the theme of the game much more closely.  But seriously, there are something like thirty outfits and they're ALL JUST RESKINS.  That's unacceptably lazy.  Of course, I got all the ones I could because I was looking for excuses to burn money.
-Gun Selection is...decent.  Honestly though I just didn't care much about some of the guns.  Silenced Weapons were so good that basically anything else didn't matter.  I mean, sure, if you want to run around and do a GTA styled rampage with the semi-automatic grenade launcher, you can, but your reputation goes down the tubes, and that's about all it's good for.  You can't carry enough ammo for the really devestating stuff, and the cops never call the national guard on you or anything, so the need for the heavier hardware is limited.
-The story is, at best, decent.  You will find no grand revelations here, just the usual "Man has been done wrong, gets revenge by doing more wrong."  Even if you max out your vigilante meter, there is a shockingly good case for you being the bad guy here.  Also, it's predictable and boring at parts, and the few times it appears to give you a moral choice ultimately don't matter until the very end of the game.
-Lack of feeling like you control the narrative.  This is about player agency, and I know, big deal, the story is linear, and they don't really hide this.  From mission one, you are given a cutscene that puts you in control of the character, but you really have no control.  If you don't do the thing you're supposed to do, the game doesn't progress.  This happens multiple times throughout the game, where I am not given a choice in what to do, but at the end of the game, I finally get a choice.  Maybe that's a grand statement about something in the narrative, but I couldn't help feel cheated that moments like that didn't help define the game.
-Music selection is limited and there are a good number of songs that aren't that great.  That's personal preference, but what do you want?
-People cheat online and there's no in-game way to report them, even through Uplay.  You have to remember the cheater's name and make a ticket submission through ubisoft's support.  Weak.  It's really bad when people have aimbots and invulnerability cheats on for singleplayer that then get transferred to multiplayer.
-Every collectable and side mission is basically skippable.  Most are fun, and they're all marked on the map and relatively easy to collect, but it is always somewhat annoying when you go through the trouble of picking up all the audio logs in the game and then do the story and are surprised by things you already know.
-Game needs a fan-made graphics patch to turn on features disabled for reasons knowable only to the developers at Ubi, though I can guess.  Either way, it was a bad idea and I'm going to dock them for it.

Conclusion:
There's a lot I'm critical of here, and probably some points that I missed, but all that said, it is a fun game.  It's just difficult to put points like "It's like GTA but pretty and with hacking and gunplay and invasions" without just sounding tired.  Like I said, it's a GTA styled game and if you like those you'll probably like this one, go play it.  If you like the idea of cyberpunk no matter the window dressings, get this game, you'll probably enjoy the hell out of it.  If you do not like open world action games or cyberpunk, skip it.  There's really nothing here for you.

This happens multiple times throughout the game, where I am not given a choice in what to do, but at the end of the game, I finally get a choice.  Maybe that's a grand statement about something in the narrative, but I couldn't help feel cheated that moments like that didn't help define the game.
-Music selection is limited and there are a good number of songs that aren't that great.  That's personal preference, but what do you want?
-People cheat online and there's no in-game way to report them, even through Uplay.  You have to remember the cheater's name and make a ticket submission through ubisoft's support.  Weak.  It's really bad when people have aimbots and invulnerability cheats on for singleplayer that then get transferred to multiplayer.
-Every collectable and side mission is basically skippable.  Most are fun, and they're all marked on the map and relatively easy to collect, but it is always somewhat annoying when you go through the trouble of picking up all the audio logs in the game and then do the story and are surprised by things you already know.
-Game needs a fan-made graphics patch to turn on features disabled for reasons knowable only to the developers at Ubi, though I can guess.  Either way, it was a bad idea and I'm going to dock them for it.

Conclusion:
There's a lot I'm critical of here, and probably some points that I missed, but all that said, it is a fun game.  It's just difficult to put points like "It's like GTA but pretty and with hacking and gunplay and invasions" without just sounding tired.  Like I said, it's a GTA styled game and if you like those you'll probably like this one, go play it.  If you like the idea of cyberpunk no matter the window dressings, get this game, you'll probably enjoy the hell out of it.  If you do not like open world action games or cyberpunk, skip it.  There's really nothing here for you.", "timestamp_created": 1410475485, "timestamp_updated": 1410475594, "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 1, "votes_funny": 0, "weighted_vote_score": "0.523809552192687988", "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review:
Tried playing again after first serious patch, on a fairly high end PC (i5 2500k + 780GTX +1gB SSD; no OC) and game is now playable 2560x1440 at almost all Ultra settings (Video Options now clearly show the ones that require more Video card memory than frankly most PC's have).

The graphics stuttering present in debut release are now fixed for me; you can actually have a fun losing the PoPo.

Downside is the fundamental gameplay itself.

I'm not into multiplayer, other than very specific combat simulators, so the randomly occuring online opponent PvP "hackoff" is way more irritating than entertaining for me.

The basic gameplay itself seems to be a bunch of pretty dumb and overly simple minigames with little connenction to each other. The only real function of the open world is to make you drive from silly minigame startpoint to the next silly minigame startpoint.

The rest of the game is a straighforward GTA (insert favorite flavor here) clone; been there, done that; Rockstar does it better. Sleeping Dogs was way better.

Wait, I forgot to mention the storyline? That is how memorable it is...

review:
Не буду скрывать, что все мы очень ждали эту игру. Полтора года как минимум (если не учитывать переносы даты релиза). Действительно, ожидалось от юбисофта многое. Уж не выдержал и купил её по предзаказу за косарь.
В день релиза - мне не удалось её запустить: просто не прет. Даже скачивал пиратский репак - всё тоже самое. О том, что комп не тянет - даже не думал, ибо совсем недавно я его апгрейдил.
Решил трабл тем, что поставил чистую винду. Запустилась по умолчанию в окне, после каждого запуска приходилось залезать в настройки дабы поставить фулскрин. 
Давно не видел игр с настолько левым сюжетом. Юбисофт давно не париться с разнообразием сюжетов своих игр. 
Поначалу, играть было достаточно интересно: просто бегать, "читать прохожих", взламывать всё подряд. Порадовали побочные задания, хотя онисами по себе разнообразны, после их выполнения получаешь разные плюшки в виде оружия и всего прочего.
От мультиплеера ожидалось большее, мб это потому что я купил вместе с другом, у него комп не понятул и пришлось мне играть одному? Может-может. Короче - мульт - просто кал.

Игра была слишком распиарена, и она не оправдала ожидания многих игроков. Её не стоит брать, надеясь увидеть интересную историю. Можно взять, если вы живете в Сибири и у вас не топять батареи. Ну а так - главная и единственная фишка игры - это взлом. У разрабов это более менее получилось. 6,9/10

review:
Для начала надо смериться с тем, что это не GTA и даже не ее аналог. 
Игра с плохой физикой, но хорошим сюжетом и интерактивным миром. Кроме того, есть несколько интересных задумок, в том числе возможность играть с IPad (правда, надо будет на планшет отдельное одноименное приложение скачать). 
В общем. игра достойна потреченного на нее времени и отданных денег.

review:
Passada a decepção inicial e coletiva, é possivel curtir melhor o jogo e ver que é um bom jogo, as unicas coisas que me incomodam muito são a falta de "profundidade" do protagonista, e a fisica do jogo principalmente em veiculos.
Em uma promoção pode ser um jogo a ser adquirido.

review:
Предзаказал игру в стиме за 900 рублей...Что я получил?

Заезженный сюжет а ля "убили жену,иду мстить,дауны похитили родственника" и т.д.

ТУПЕЙШИЕ сюжетные повороты

ГЕЙМПЛЭЙ, полностью схожий с сплинтир цилам и отсосинс срид...

ТУПОЙ И.И. а ля "тут был взрыв,пойду сдохну" или "он уплыл под мост... куда он делся?"

ТУПЫЕ головоломки

ГГ - ПОХУИСТ, ему просто похуй на все, что происходит вокруг,главное,что он МСТИТ (ой,у этой девушки 27 детей...Но она работает там же,где и убийцы моей жены...РАСЧЛЕНИТЬ, СЖЕЧЬ,РАСТВОРИТЬ В КИСЛОТЕ!!!111)

НАИХУЕВЕЙШАЯ русская озвучка,ГГ знает только 2 интонации - тихий и тихий со вздохами (да,это не интонации)

ХУЕВАЯ физика

ГГ ХАКАЕТ ВСЯКУЮ ХУЙНЮ, типа СВЕТОФОРА БЛЯТЬ

ТУПОЙ И.И [2] - люди не могут есздить ни на мотоциклах,ни ПЛАВАТЬ БЛЯТЬ,даже нету сраной ВОДНОЙ полиции,хотя ЛОДКИ имеются...

Необычный мультиплеер,который надоедает уже после 40 минуты игры...

review:
Buy only on sale.
Boring and stupid storyline.
The hacking mechanic is extremely simplistic and the cool factor wears off almost immediately.
Anti climatic boss fights.
Graphics are not what they showed on demos (although there are mods to re enable them).
Driving feels arcadey.
Frustrating camera sometimes, especially when helicopters decide to park right on top of your head, or when you're driving, so you cannot target them at all.
The best parts of the game are actually secondary sections of the main storyline, when you're chasing the henchmen of the real bad guy, the rest is pathetic.

review: Horrible game.Lots of useless irrelevant information in the game information. Some of the side games are really cheesey and not very well thought out. The begginning of the game is ridiculously hard untill you start to unlock skills making it near impossible some times. The final missing is completly ridiculous and near impossible.  The charaters whine and cry throughout the game and its just a downer. The worst part is the graphics WHICH ARE NOTHING CLOSE TO WHAT WAS ADVERTISED. They said they had to turn them down for better compatibility. Still not what was advertised was it, and even still good graphics do not make a game good. You end up stealing a lot of money in the game but you don't even need money for anything really. Most of what you do besides the campaign is a waste of your time unless you want to collect things for game completion but you REALLY have to be bored. Also if you know anything about computers, most of the things in the game will make you say WTF? OK?

review:
Demasiadas promesas sin cumplir,el boicot de los gráficos y la poca duración hace de Watch Dogs un juego mediocre si a caso.
La historia (que es de los puntos fuertes) es horrible y bastante torpe,pareciéndose mas a una actividad secundaria que a una campaña principal, y el MJ fallo,eso que prometia dar horas de juego,fallo.

싱글 플레이 하면서 지루했던 미션은 거의 없었고 스토리도 괜찮았구 또 해킹이라는 현대에 맞는 컨셉으로 조금더 흥미를 가졌던거 같네요
불평하는 사람도 있지만은 이게임 꺵판만 안친다면 정말 재밌는 게임입니다 또 마지막 엔딩때는 소소한 반전도 있구 ㅋㅋ 
이게임을 살까 고민하시는 분들에게 한말씀 하자면 60 달러 그이상의 게임이라곤 보기 좀 힘들 수 있겠지만 그 이하의 게임은 또 절대 아닙니다

review: If you like GTA or Sleeping Dogs, you'll probably love this game as well. The plot is passable, but I really think this game could have been much longer - as luck would have it, the game is open word however, so you can really drag it out, and unlike GTA, parts of the map are not blocked off when you start - the whole city is your playground. Hacking, while fun and useful, could have offered more depth. The caution in one of the trailers to not just hack anyone is really overblown though, as a Blume affiliate hack will either trigger an online invasion, or trigger nothing at all. I was honestly expecting an NPC to try to kill me later in the game, or maybe even lose rep for hacking a poor person with cancer, but no, there's nothing like that offered. Over all, I love the game, it's a great waste of time.
